ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  I m using a six-note and EBW.  Hadn t planned it that way, it just sort of happened.  I would still keep a Ykesha and/or shard handy though for when
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Jeff Illian wrote:
>
> Early bardic life a procing weapon is good. I'm told that in a bard's late
> life you don't want the additional taunt of a proc. At level 45 I'm duel
> wielding Ykesha's or a Ykesha and a Kisch. Every 50th level bard I know
> tells me that what I'm really going to want short of planes weapons is an
> orb or duel EBWs so I can still damage without the taunt. We'll see :)

Heh. I'm using a six-note and EBW. Hadn't planned it that
way, it just sort of happened. I would still keep a Ykesha
and/or shard handy though for when you're forced to tank and
AE songs are not an option.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
